data.name: Heartbreak Strike
data.text: Your Attack deals more damage and inflicts Weak.

data.name: Heartbreak Flourish
data.text: Your Special deals more damage and inflicts Weak.

data.name: Crush Shot
data.text: Your Cast is a wide, short-range blast that inflicts Weak.

data.name: Passion Flare
data.text: Your Cast damages foes around you and inflicts Weak.

data.name: Passion Dash
data.text: Your Dash inflicts damage where you end up, inflicting Weak.

data.name: Aphrodite's Aid
data.text: Your Call fires a seeking projectile that inflicts Charm.

data.name: Dying Lament
data.text: When foes are slain, they damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.

data.name: Wave of Despair
data.text: After you take damage, damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.

data.name: Different League
data.text: Resist some damage from nearby foes' attacks.

data.name: Life Affirmation
data.text: Any Health or Health chamber rewards are worth more.

data.name: Empty Inside
prerequisites: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish
data.text: Your Weak effects have a longer duration.

data.name: Sweet Surrender
prerequisites: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish
data.text: Weak-afflicted foes are also more susceptible to damage.

data.name: Broken Resolve
prerequisites: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish
data.text: Your Weak effects are more potent.

data.name: Blown Kiss
prerequisites: Crush Shot
data.text: Your Cast shoots farther and is stronger against undamaged foes.

data.name: Unhealthy Fixation
prerequisites: Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish
Empty Inside, Sweet Surrender, Broken Resolve
data.text: Your Weak effects also have a 15% chance to Charm foes.

data.name: Curse of Agony
data.text: Your Attack inflicts Doom.

data.name: Curse of Pain
data.text: Your Special inflicts Doom.

data.name: Slicing Shot
data.text: Your Cast sends a Blade Rift hurling ahead.

data.name: Slicing Flare
data.text: Your Cast sends a large Blade Rift hurling ahead for a brief time.

data.name: Blade Dash
data.text: Your Dash creates a Blade Rift where you started.

data.name: Ares' Aid
data.text: Your Call turns you into an Impervious Blade Rift for 1.2 Sec.

data.name: Curse of Vengeance
data.text: After you take damage, inflict Doom on surrounding foes.

data.name: Urge to Kill
data.text: Your Attack and Cast deal more damage.

data.name: Battle Rage
data.text: After slaying a foe, your next Attack or Special deals more damage.

data.name: Blood Frenzy
data.text: After using Death Defiance, deal more damage that encounter.

data.name: Black Metal
prerequisites: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Slicing Flare, Slicing Shot
data.text: Your Blade Rift powers deal damage in a wider area.

data.name: Engulfing Vortex
prerequisites: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Slicing Flare, Slicing Shot
data.text: Your Blade Rift effects last longer and pull foes in.

data.name: Dire Misfortune
prerequisites: Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain
data.text: Your Doom effects deal more damage when applied multiple times.

data.name: Impending Doom
prerequisites: Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain, Curse of Vengeance
data.text: Your Doom effects deal more damage, after +0.5 Sec.

data.name: Vicious Cycle
prerequisites: Black Metal, Engulfing Vortex
data.text: Your Blade Rift effects deal more damage for each consecutive hit.

data.name: Curse of Longing
prerequisites: Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain
Crush Shot, Heartbreak Flourish, Heartbreak Strike, Passion Dash, Passion Flare
data.text: Your Doom effects continuously strike Weak foes.

data.name: Deadly Strike
data.text: Your Attack is stronger, with +15% chance to deal Critical damage.

data.name: Deadly Flourish
data.text: Your Special is stronger, with +20% chance to deal Critical damage.

data.name: True Shot
data.text: Your Cast seeks foes, with a 10% chance to deal Critical damage.

data.name: Hunter's Flare
data.text: Your Cast damages foes around you, with a 10% Critical chance.

data.name: Hunter Dash
data.text: Your Dash-Strike deals more damage.

data.name: Artemis' Aid
data.text: Your Call fires a seeking arrow with +35% Critical chance.

data.name: Pressure Points
data.text: Any damage you deal has a chance to be Critical.

data.name: Exit Wounds
prerequisites: Crush Shot, Electric Shot, Flood Shot, Phalanx Shot, True Shot
data.text: Your foes take damage when your Cast Ammo stuck in them is dislodged.

data.name: Hide Breaker
prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Pressure Points, True Shot
data.text: Your Critical effects deal even more damage to Armor.

data.name: Clean Kill
prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Pressure Points, True Shot
data.text: Your Critical effects deal even more damage.

data.name: Hunter Instinct
prerequisites: Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Pressure Points, True Shot
data.text: Your God Gauge charges faster when you deal Critical damage.

data.name: Hunter's Mark
prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter Dash, Pressure Points, True Shot
data.text: After you deal Critical damage to a foe, a foe near it is Marked.

data.name: Support Fire
prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter Dash, Pressure Points, True Shot
data.text: After you Cast, or hit with an Attack or Special, fire a seeking arrow.

data.name: Fully Loaded
prerequisites: Exit Wounds, Pressure Points, Support Fire
Exit Wounds, Pressure Points, Support Fire
data.text: Gain extra Cast Ammo for your Cast.

data.name: Heart Rend
prerequisites: Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter's Flare, True Shot
Crush Shot, Heartbreak Flourish, Heartbreak Strike, Passion Dash, Passion Flare
data.text: Your Critical effects deal even more damage to Weak foes.

data.name: Hunting Blades
prerequisites: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter Dash
Slicing Flare, Slicing Shot
data.text: Your Cast creates a faster Blade Rift that seeks the nearest foe.

data.name: Divine Strike
data.text: Your Attack is stronger, and can Deflect.

data.name: Divine Flourish
data.text: Your Special is stronger, and can Deflect.

data.name: Phalanx Shot
data.text: Your Cast damages foes in a small area, and can Deflect.

data.name: Phalanx Flare
data.text: Your Cast damages foes around you, and can Deflect.

data.name: Divine Dash
data.text: Your Dash deals damage and can Deflect.

data.name: Athena's Aid
data.text: Your Call briefly makes you Invulnerable and Deflect all attacks.

data.name: Holy Shield
data.text: After you take damage, damage nearby foes and briefly Deflect.

data.name: Bronze Skin
data.text: Resist damage from foes' attacks.

data.name: Sure Footing
data.text: Resist damage from Traps.

data.name: Proud Bearing
prerequisites: Aphrodite's Aid, Ares' Aid, Artemis' Aid, Athena's Aid, Demeter's Aid, Dionysus' Aid, Poseidon's Aid, Zeus' Aid
data.text: You begin each Encounter with your God Gauge partly full.

data.name: Blinding Flash
prerequisites: Divine Strike, Phalanx Shot, Divine Dash, Divine Flourish
data.text: Your abilities that can Deflect also make foes Exposed for 5 Sec.

data.name: Brilliant Riposte
prerequisites: Divine Strike, Divine Dash, Holy Shield, Divine Flourish
data.text: When you Deflect attacks, they deal more damage.

data.name: Deathless Stand
data.text: Death Defiance makes you Impervious longer. Replenish 1 charge now.

data.name: Last Stand
data.text: Death Defiance<.b> restores more Health than usual. Replenish 1 charge now.

data.name: Divine Protection
prerequisites: Brilliant Riposte
data.text: You have a barrier that negates incoming damage.

data.name: Parting Shot
prerequisites: Divine Strike, Phalanx Shot, Divine Flourish, Divine Dash, Athena's Aid
Passion Dash, Crush Shot, Heartbreak Strike, Heartbreak Flourish, Aphrodite's Aid
data.text: Your Cast gains any bonuses you have for striking foes from behind.

data.name: Merciful End
prerequisites: Divine Strike, Divine Flourish
Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain
data.text: Your attacks that can Deflect immediately activate Doom effects.

data.name: Deadly Reversal
prerequisites: Divine Strike, Divine Flourish
Deadly Strike, Deadly Flourish, True Shot, Artemis' Aid
data.text: After you Deflect, briefly gain +20% chance to deal Critical damage.

data.name: Arctic Blast
prerequisites: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, Mistral Dash, Snow Burst

data.name: Killing Freeze
prerequisites: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, Mistral Dash, Snow Burst

data.name: Glacial Glare
prerequisites: Crystal Beam

data.name: Winter Harvest
prerequisites: Arctic Blast, Ravenous Will, Killing Freeze
Arctic Blast, Ravenous Will, Killing Freeze

prerequisites: Crystal Beam
Heartbreak Strike, Passion Dash, Heartbreak Flourish, Aphrodite's Aid

prerequisites: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, Mistral Dash
Slicing Shot, Slicing Flare

data.name: Crystal Clarity
prerequisites: Crystal Beam
Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, Hunter Dash

data.name: Stubborn Roots
prerequisites: Frost Strike, Mistral Dash, Frost Flourish, Crystal Beam, Demeter's Aid
Divine Strike, Divine Flourish, Phalanx Shot, Divine Dash, Athena's Aid

prerequisites: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Strike

prerequisites: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Strike

prerequisites: Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, Drunken Strike

prerequisites: Trippy Shot, Trippy Flare

Trippy Shot, Trippy Flare

Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain, Curse of Vengeance

prerequisites: Aphrodite's Aid, Ares' Aid, Artemis' Aid, Athena's Aid, Demeter's Aid, Dionysus' Aid, Poseidon's Aid, Zeus' Aid
